title: i cant move at all
body: I wasn't able to move at all when i went to a game. However i was able to cast my abilities and was still able to buy items. at first i tried to reconnect to the game to see if it worked, but it didn't. It has been like this since patch 7.4 .

replies.body:
If you're able to cast spells and buy items, but unable to move, it is most likely an issue with your configuration files. Since this issue started after updating to patch 7.4, there's a good chance that something went wrong with your configuration files. Let's reset your configuration files in case it was damaged during the patch. 

-Log into the game client.
-Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
-Delete the file named game.cfg and persistedsettings.json
-Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. Leave game to sync settings.

Let me know how this works out for you!
i was still not able to move at all, but like i said i am still able to cast stuff and buy stuff. the weird thing was that when i logged into my other account, i was able to move.

Since we've reset your configuration files and you're still not able to move on one of your accounts, it may be due to a sporadic break in connection. Let's narrow down the issue with our [Connections Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is in order there. 

Hit me back if this helps!
